Name: The Touryst
About the game: You are just arriving at the Monument Islands. Want to go swimming? Or rather take a dive into the deep sea? Or do you want to visit the amusement arcade, do some shopping, dance at the beach party? Fancy some surfing? Or will you talk with the strange old tourist and listen what he has to say about these ancient mysterious monuments.. Discover exotic islands and explore ancient monuments Climb into deep mines and uncover secret passages Make the trip you always wanted and enjoy the tourist life An action adventure as varied as real life 240fps supported Enjoy your vacation!
